resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104474</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104474</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206255</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Universe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Universum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Univers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Universo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Universo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κόσμος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Universo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">explores questions that include: How do galaxies and stars form? What powered the Big Bang? What is dark energy and how is it pulling the universe apart? Is the universe expanding? What happens at the edge of a black hole? Is there life beyond earth?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erforscht Fragen, die einschließen: Wie 
bilden sich Galaxien und Sterne? Was schaltete den grossen Knall
an? Was ist dunkle Energie und wie es zieht das Universum 
auseinander? Erweitert das Universum? Was geschieht am 
Rand einer schwarzen Bohrung? Gibt es Leben über Masse hinaus?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">explore les questions qui incluent : Comment
est-ce que vont les galaxies et tiennent le premier rôle la forme ? Qu'a
actionné le grand coup ? Quelle est énergie foncée et comment
il tire l'univers à part ? L'univers augmente-t-il ? Que 
se produit au bord d'un trou noir ? Y a-t-il la vie au delà de 
la terre ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">explora as perguntas que incluem: Como as 
galáxias e as estrelas dão forma? Que powered o estrondo 
grande? Que são energia escura e como ele estão puxando o 
universo distante? O universo está expandindo? Que 
acontece na borda de um furo preto? Há uma vida além da terra?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esplora le domande che includono: Come le 
galassie e le stelle formano? Che cosa ha alimentato lo scoppio 
grande? Che cosa è energia scura e come esso sta tirando 
l'universo a parte? L'universo sta espandendosi? Che cosa 
accade al bordo di un foro nero? È ci vita oltre terra?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ερευνά τις ερωτήσεις που περιλαμβάνουν: Πώς οι 
γαλαξίες και τα αστέρια διαμορφώνουν; Αυτό που τροφοδότησε 
το μεγάλο κτύπημα; Τι είναι σκοτεινή ενέργεια και πώς 
τραβά τον κόσμο χώρια; Ο κόσμος επεκτείνεται; Αυτό 
που συμβαίνει στην άκρη μιας μαύρης τρύπας; Υπάρχει ζωή 
πέρα από τη γη;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">explora las preguntas que incluyen: ¿Cómo 
las galaxias y las estrellas forman? ¿Qué accionó la 
explosión grande? ¿Cuál es energía oscura y cómo él está 
tirando del universo aparte? ¿El universo se está ampliando? 
¿Qué sucede en el borde de un calabozo? ¿Hay vida más 
allá de la tierra?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206255</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104474</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/universe</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
